name: Invaders From Earth (Ardkil, takumipan)
description:
You are a planet with the rarest resource on the universe called Glorbozoid. The greedy humans from outer space of course want to steal your resources for themselves. But you won't let them be. Glory to Glorbuz. Use the power of directing your and your satellite's gravity to destroy the humans. Don't RUN out of resources. Try to harness as much energy as possible. With enough energy you will be able to annihilate all the humans. -Glorb

A game made for RunJam by Ardkil and Takumipan

Coding and sound effects by Ardkil

Assets by Takumipan

Music by wee wee free music

(4) Royalty Free Sci-Fi background music for videos | Deep Space - YouTube

(4) SciFi Music for YouTube videos [ NO COPYRIGHT] - YouTube

Note: the game does not work as well in fullscreen
